org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes

Class ColorAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes.BaseAttribute
      • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes.ColorAttribute

  • public class ColorAttribute
extends BaseAttribute
    Attribute to hold a color value with alpha.

      • getSQLType

        public AttributeDataType getSQLType()
        Get the data type for storage in the database. Colors are stored in hex string form in the database.
        Specified by:
        getSQLType in class BaseAttribute
        Returns:
        The data type used for storage in he database (text).

      • setFromString

        public boolean setFromString(java.lang.String text)
        Set the Attribute from a string
        Parameters:
        text - The String to parse
        Returns:
        True, Strings are always accepted (even empty)

      • getSQLInsert

        public java.lang.String getSQLInsert()
        Get the String value as a hex formatted string. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3607858/convert-a-rgb-color-value-to-a-hexadecimal-string
        Specified by:
        getSQLInsert in class BaseAttribute
        Returns:
        The String value of the color (hex formatted string) for SQL insert.

      • getEditor

        public javax.swing.JComponent getEditor()
        Get the editor for this color attribute.
        Specified by:
        getEditor in class BaseAttribute
        Returns:
        The editor component for this attribute.

      • setFromObject

        public void setFromObject(java.lang.Object object)
        Set from an object. This expects the object to be either a Color or a string. The undo queue uses the Color while the database uses the string form.
        Specified by:
        setFromObject in class BaseAttribute
        Parameters:
        object - The object to cast or parse into a color.
